title: Limelight
actors: Charlie Chaplin,Claire Bloom,Nigel Bruce,Buster Keaton,Sydney Chaplin,Norman Lloyd,Andre Eglevsky,Marjorie Bennett,Melissa Hayden,Wheeler Dryden,Barry Bernard,Stapleton Kent,Mollie Glessing,'Snub' Pollard,Geraldine Chaplin,Oona Chaplin,Edna Purviance,Colin Kenny,Cyril Delevanti
summary: A fading music hall comedian tries to help a despondent ballet dancer learn to walk and to again feel confident about life.

title: Songs My Brothers Taught Me
actors: Irene Bedard,Eléonore Hendricks,Taysha Fuller,Travis Lone Hill,Dakota Brown,John Reddy,Jashaun St. John,Cat Clifford,Kevin Hunter,Derrick Janis,Allen Reddy,Wambli BearRunner,George Dull Knife,Shamauri Hawkins,Lauren Janis,Gabby Montileaux,Dorothy Nelson,Keanna Rowland
summary: This complex portrait of modern-day life on the Pine Ridge Indian Reservation explores the bond between a brother and his younger sister, who find themselves on separate paths to rediscovering the meaning of home.

title: Project A
actors: Jackie Chan,Sammo Hung,Yuen Biao,Dick Wei,Tai Bo,Mars,Isabella Wong,Kwan Hoi-San,Lau Hak-Suen,Wong Wai,Lee Hoi-Sang,Hon Yee-Sang,John Cheung Ng-Long,Wan Fat,Wu Ma,Fung Ging-Man,Law Ho-Kai,To Siu-Ming,Tong Kam-Tong,Kwan Yung-Moon,Bruce Tong Yim-Chaan,Benny Lai Keung-Kuen,Lola Forner,Lorry Chin Ka-Lok
summary: In late 19th Century Hong Kong the British may rule the land, but the pirates rule the waters. One Coast Guard officer is Dragon Ma, who is determined that his beloved Coast Guard will not be made a fool of.
